sentences.en: All things being equal, should it matter who earns most money?
sentences.cn: 如果一切不变，谁赚的钱最多有什么关系吗？

sentences.en: Any number to the power of nought is equal to one.
sentences.cn: 任何数的0次方等于1。

sentences.en: As a pastor, it can be argued he has no equal.
sentences.cn: 作为牧师，他可以说是出类拔萃。

sentences.en: Both candidates received an equal number of votes.
sentences.cn: 两位候选人的得票数相等。

sentences.en: He treats all his staff as equals.
sentences.cn: 他对所有员工都一视同仁。

sentences.en: I’m not sure he’s equal to the task.
sentences.cn: 我不确定他是否能胜任这项任务。

sentences.en: Investors can borrow an amount equal to the property's purchase price.
sentences.cn: 投资者可以获得与房产购买价格相等的借款额。

sentences.en: it follows that, other things being equal, the price level will rise.
sentences.cn: 所以，在同等条件下，价格水平会上升。

sentences.en: Not all acts of vengeance are of equal gravity.
sentences.cn: 并非所有的报复行为都同等恶劣。

sentences.en: Other things being equal, most tenants would prefer single to shared rooms.
sentences.cn: 如果其他条件不变，大多数房客都愿意住单人间而不会选择与他人同住。

sentences.en: Our constitution states that all men are equal.
sentences.cn: 我们的宪法规定人人平等。

sentences.en: Prices become more stable when supply equals demand.
sentences.cn: 供需相当时价格就变得较为稳定。

sentences.en: She was one of the boys, their equal.
sentences.cn: 她也是男孩子们中的一员，和他们不相上下。

sentences.en: The film demands attention, and has no equal in cinema history.
sentences.cn: 那部电影众人瞩目，在电影史上无与伦比。

sentences.en: The plusses and minuses were about equal.
sentences.cn: 利弊大致均衡。

sentences.en: The police force is committed to being an equal opportunities employer.
sentences.cn: 警方承诺向所有警员提供均等机会。

sentences.en: The targets would not be achieved unless other departments showed equal commitment.
sentences.cn: 除非其他部门同样努力，否则这些目标无法达成。

sentences.en: The Ukraine is roughly equal to France in size and population.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰的面积和人口与法国大致相当。

sentences.en: They are now trying to compete on an equal footing.
sentences.cn: 他们现在想要公平竞争。

sentences.en: Two plus two equals four.
sentences.cn: 二加二等于四。

sentences.en: We are giving an equal area of land to the landless.
sentences.cn: 我们向无耕地者分发同等面积的土地。

sentences.en: We were brainwashed to believe we were all equal.
sentences.cn: 我们被洗了脑，认为人人都是平等的。

words.tran_cn: 同样地；相等地，平等地；公平地
补偿器；补偿电路；平衡装置（等于equalizer）
均衡器，[电] 平衡器；平衡装置；使相等的东西
使相等（equalize的过去时和过去分词）
使均衡；使平等；均分；补足（等于equalize）
对手；匹敌；同辈；[数]相等的事物

phrases.tran_cn: 一切顺利的话，不出意外的话
同等就业机会，均等就业机会
（美）相等的答辩时间；均等机会
立于平等地位；平等对待
其他因素（或条件）不变，同等条件下
在其他条件都相同的情况下

trans.tran_cn: 相等的，相等于，相等匹敌
trans.tran_en: to be exactly the same in size, number, or amount as something else

trans.tran_cn: 同样的，平等的，均等的，胜任的
trans.tran_en: the same in size, number, amount, value etc as something else
someone who is as important, intelligent etc as you are, or who has the same rights and opportunities as you do
to be exactly the same in size, number, or amount as something else
to be as good as something else, or get to the same standard as someone or something else
